name: YouTube DeepDark Material Tweaks
additional_info: 2.8.9 Initial Release - removed the white columns that appear on wide monitors, increased font sizes and weights for Video Titles and Authors, altered text area for Comments with border and changed text color to match custom settings, then altered the user name color, as well as, increased font size and weight for user names. Changed color for suggested video titles and increased font weight for author names within them.

discussions.name: PLEASE NOTE: This style requires the YouTube DeepDark Material style by RaitaroH to be installed!
